actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code so as to make presumptions relating to certain diseases applicable to veterans who served during the period between the end of World War II and the beginning of the Korean conflict.

summary.text: Authorizes the Veterans' Administration to make presumptions relating to the date of origin of specific diseases applicable to veterans who served during the period between the end of World War II and the beginning of the Korean conflict. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 337)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code so as to make presumptions relating to certain diseases applicable to veterans who served during the period between the end of World War II and the beginning of the Korean conflict.
